Class AbstractVersionChanger

java.lang.Object
org.codehaus.mojo.versions.change.AbstractVersionChanger
All Implemented Interfaces:
VersionChanger
Direct Known Subclasses:
DependencyVersionChanger, ParentVersionChanger, PluginVersionChanger, ProjectVersionChanger
public abstract class AbstractVersionChanger extends Object implements VersionChanger
Abstract base class for VersionChanger implementations.

This class provides common functionality and holds references to the Maven Model, a mutable XML stream reader for the POM file, and a logger for logging purposes.

Since:
15-Sep-2010 15:59:46
Author:
Stephen Connolly
